Retrieve the secret key (mnemonic) for a wallet. Requires authentication.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request parameters for the get_secret_key endpoint","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Get wallet secret key","required":["fingerprint"],"properties":{"fingerprint":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"Wallet fingerprint","example":1234567890,"minimum":0}},"title":"GetSecretKey"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response from get_secret_key","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response with secret key information","properties":{"secrets":{"oneOf":[{"type":"null"},{"description":"Secret key information if authorized","type":"object","required":["secret_key"],"properties":{"mnemonic":{"type":["string","null"]},"secret_key":{"type":"string"}},"title":"SecretKeyInfo"}]}},"title":"GetSecretKeyResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid parameters or malformed JSON"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - no wallet is currently logged in, or authentication is required"},"404":{"description":"Not found - requested resource doesn't exist (e.g., NFT, offer, transaction)"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error - unexpected failure in wallet operations"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
